AppDB.Name: FABRIC_PIPES_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping cast and priority into a pipe

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_PIPES_STRICT_PRIORITY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Which pipe gets strict priority over the other pipes

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CELL_PRIORITY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Maps packet parameters to cell priority

Field.Description: From which priority cell will be considered as TDM priority
Field.Name: MIN_TDM_PRIORITY

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_PCP_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set packet cell packing for each module id

Field.Description: is WFQ affected by both ocb/non-ocb traffic or by non-ocb traffic only
Field.Name: IS_WFQ_AFFECTED_BY_OCB_TRAFFIC

Field.Description: FIFO to configure the weight upon
Field.Name: FABRIC_WFQ_FIFO

Field.Description: Active Link Down Watchdog Period (in clocks units)
Field.Name: ALDWP

Field.Description: Active Link Up Watchdog Period (in clocks units)
Field.Name: ALUWP

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_FAULT_LINKS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Get fabric fault links. Both on link local side and on link remote side.

Field.Description: Link is active on local side
Field.Name: FAULT_LOCAL

Field.Description: Link is active on remote side
Field.Name: FAULT_REMOTE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_LINKS_ALLOWED
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure which links are allowed for sending traffic

Field.Description: Is link allowed for sending cells
Field.Name: IS_ALLOWED

Field.Description: Is link allowed for sending reachability messages
Field.Name: IS_ALLOWED_REACHABILITY

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_SR_CELL_TRANSMIT_DATA
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Memory where source routed cells will be written

Field.Description: Fourth part of SR cell place to write
Field.Name: SR_CELL_DATA_3

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_SR_CELL_RECEIVE_DATA
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Memory where source routed cells will be written

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_SR_CELL_RECEIVE_CONTROL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Memory where source routed cells will be written

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_MESH_DEV_ID_LOCAL_INIT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mesh local device ids init configuration

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_MESH_DEV_ID_DEST_INIT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mesh destination device ids init configuration

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_DELAY_SINGLE_CELL_IN_FABRIC_RX
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Delay single cell in fabric Rx

Field.Description: Enable delay of single cell in fabric Rx until a second cell will arrive (or timeout)
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_MIN_LINKS_TO_DEST
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Minimum links to destination per modid

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_MIN_LINKS_MULTICAST
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Minimum links to destination for multicast

Field.Description: Rate of updating the all-reachable vector [clocks]
Field.Name: RATE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TDM_CONTEXTS_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map contexts to fabric TDM contexts

Field.Description: If set, the sub-context is mapped to fabric TDM context
Field.Name: IS_TDM

Field.Description: If set, IRE is mapped to fabric TDM context
Field.Name: IS_TDM_BYPASS

Field.Description: For which contexts, packets from context instance may be interleaved with
Field.Name: SUBCONTEXT_ENABLE

Field.Description: For which contexts, packets from TDM context may be interleaved with
Field.Name: SUBCONTEXT_TDM_ENABLE

Field.Description: What are the units resolution between each LFSR change
Field.Name: RESOLUTION

Field.Description: Counting mode which tells what are the units for the resolution field
Field.Name: COUNT_MODE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_LOAD_BALANCING_RR_PTR
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Load balancing round robin pointer configurations

Field.Description: Mask link integrity information for scheduling with multicast links
Field.Name: ENABLE_MC_LINKS_MASK

Field.Description: Mask link integrity information for scheduling with active links
Field.Name: ENABLE_ACTIVE_LINKS_MASK

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRAFFIC_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enabling or disabling receiving of data in fabric
